RECwerk desktop release.

Artifacts:

- Linux AppImage
- Windows portable executable
- macOS zip app bundle

Highlights:

- Fixed packaged asset loading for desktop and web
- Added RECwerk project open/load improvements, including drag and drop
- Added multitrack workspace foundations with mixer, master channel and asset library
- Added separate mixer and library pop-out/dock windows
- Added batch tagging, metadata writeback and export metadata embedding
- Added resizable waveform/workspace layout and better scaling across small and large displays
- Fixed multiple processing effect issues and verified effect runtime sweeps
